name: The Music of Vyn
description:
The combined soundtracks from the role playing adventures Nehrim: At Fate's Edge and Enderal: Fogotten Stories. Composed by Lukas Deuschel, Simon W. Autenrieth and Marvin Kopp.

The Enderal: Forgotten Stories Soundtrack

The Enderal: Forgotten Stories Soundtrack composed by Marvin Kopp. This is the additional score for the award winning role-playing adventure Enderal: The Shards of Order.

Tracks: 11
Year: 2019
Audio file format: FLAC (HQ)
Overall runtime: 34m

Nehrim: At Fate's Edge Soundtrack

The Nehrim: At Fate's Edge Soundtrack composed by Simon W. Autenrieth.

Tracks: 62
Audio file format: MP3
Overall runtime: 2:29:22
